Additionally, I would like a service that is easy to use and integrates seamlessly with my online banking system.

Lastly, if your service has a competitive pricing structure and offers better rates and rewards than my current provider, I would definitely consider making the switch.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As an innovative entrepreneur who values financial management tools, I would rate my likelihood of trying out your new digital banking service as an 8 out of 10.
